mapper.insert: insert into t02_his_cult ( his_id, module_id, index_title, index_content, img_path, index_state, pub_state, group_id, order_by, cre_time, upd_time )values( #{his_id}, #{module_id}, #{index_title}, #{index_content}, #{img_path}, #{index_state}, #{pub_state}, #{group_id}, #{order_by}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select e.*,o.function_name from t02_his_cult e left join t01_function_info o on e.module_id = o.module_id
order by e.index_title

select CONCAT(module_id,group_id) as id, index_title as title,index_content as content,img_path as img_url from t02_his_cult where 1=1
and index_state=1
and pub_state=1 and index_state=1
order by order_by

select CONCAT(module_id,group_id) as id,index_title as title,index_content as content,img_path as img_url from t02_cult_geograph where 1=1
and index_state=1
and pub_state=1 and index_state=1
